text: But in his absence his chief lieutenants have not let him down. The strong arm of authority has been raised against the strikers and is now beginning to tell. Today's The Government has been urged to take immediate action to deal ruthlessly with the strikers.
handwritten_text: But in his absence his chief lieutenants have not let him down. The strong arm of authority has been raised against the strikers and is now beginning to tell. Today's The Government has been urged to take immediate action to deal ruthlessly with the strikers.
